Hallo!

 

This group sounds very interesting. I'm happy to find this group. 

 

I have a web-page www.sharpweaponcenter.com
<http://www.sharpweaponcenter.com/> . This page is Sweden's biggest page
about Japanese swords with forum and facts. I have around 262 members. 

I have working on this page since 2002. The page has become bigger than I
thought. Today I have around 120 visitors every day. 

 

If you have some information you want to tell the Swedish collectors about
Japanese swords just send a mail.  

 

Yours,

 

Per- Erik (Pelle) Eriksson

 <mailto:pelle@...> pelle@...

 <http://www.sharpweaponcenter.com> www.sharpweaponcenter.com
